greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = (A268670(n)+1) / 2.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..13107
mathematica: f[n_] := Fold[BitXor, n, Quotient[n, 2^Range[BitLength@ n - 1]]]; g[n_] := If[OddQ@ #, n, g[#/2]] &@ f[n]; Table[(f@ g@ n + 1)/2, {n, 85}]  (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Feb 12 2016, after _Jan Mangaldan_ at A006068 *)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Feb 10 2016
